text: On Saturday, Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux were spotted enjoying a night out in New York City. The 47 - year - old and her 45 - year - old husband left a stylish restaurant called The Smile in Manhattan's NoHo neighbourhood. She was seen clasping his hand. Their evening together comes five days after Angelina Jolie filed for divorce from Aniston's ex - husband Brad Pitt.
